introduction: SYNOPSISMyung-ju is married to Chairman Pyo Jun-beom, the sixty something chairman of a trading company whom she met in Sorak Mountain. She is thrown into conflict when Chairman Pyo's only daughter, Seong-hi, starts going out with Hyuk-tae, an old flame of Myung-ju who has just finished his military duty. Byung-ho finds out about Myung-ju's lingering feelings for Hyuk-tae. He demands money to keep quiet. Then one day, Myung-ju's bloody body is found inside the house. Seong-hi is furious to find out that at the time of her father's remarriage, her mother was discarded away and that she is now at a mental institution in Busan. Meanwhile, after murdering Myung-ju, Chairman Pyo is being blackmailed by Byung-ho. Chairman Pyo snaps and kills Byung-ho which Seong-hi witnesses. Finally, Chairman Pyo is arrested due to a blackmail tape found in Byung-ho's room.
